description.@en: We pray to the heavens that this parched earth shall drink once again . . .

effect.@en:
After successfully casting, you conjure forth rainy weather. Based on your [WB], the strength of the weather produces the following effects in combat:

- [WB] 1 to 6: Light Obscurement (light rain), reduces foe’s Movement by -1.

- [WB] 7 to 12: Medium Obscurement (thunderstorm), reduces foe’s Movement by -2.

- [WB] 13+: Heavy Obscurement (sleet), reduces foe’s Movement by -3.

criticalSuccess.@en: Choose the strength of the weather instead.

criticalFailure.@en: Acidic rain will fall for 9+[WB] days in the area, killing all plants.

reagents.@en: A chant, dance or ritual that would urge rain to fall from the sky

system.distance: Any place you can see clearly
